textBox.richText: Hey Everyone. Just a quick one this time before easter throws all its chocolate, excellent food and beers over us. Just wanted to make everyone aware of the most deserved Oscar this year... Logorama - that’s God damn art! I have put a link to the movie here - enjoy. I have seen it several times now and it just keeps getting better :) Besides that little intermezzo I don’t have that much new stuff to add. The last couple of weeks I have been working in order to be able to take some days off over easter. Got a referee report on my submitted paper a couple of weeks ago, which was REALLY positive, so it only took a couple of days to put together a reply, and already a couple of days after that ApJ send me an email to let me know that they had accepted it for publication - so that was amazing! So this weekend we went out to celebrate a bit. Besides that we also had to say goodbye to Bhargav in a proper way before he left for 5 months in the US today - and so we did, with good food, beers and whiskey. Right now I’m just getting ready for a couple of days in DK ‘celebrating’ easter with my parents, brother and Mette. Was also concidering going to a concert friday with White Pony and Fagget Fairys at Posten which I think is gonna be an awesome concert - they really know how to put on a party... but let’s see; I haven’t decided anything yet. Talk to you soon Cheers /K
